text: Nos appointed angels est tutor Hell nos assigned their numerus (19) (1) disturb disbelievers (2) convince Christians Jews hoc est divine scripture) (3) strengthen faith de fidelis (4) remove totus traces de doubt hearts Christians Jews alias prout believers (5) expose those harbor doubt their hearts disbelievers; they dictus Quod perfecit DEUS mean hoc allegory? DEUS ergo sends astray whomever He testimentum ac guides whomever He testimentum! Nullus knows militis tuus Dominus absque He! Hoc est reminder people
